channel.title: Comments on: Use the GROUPING function to determine whether a value is NULL because of ROLLUP
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: chopstik
item.dc:creator: chopstik
item.description: Thanks, Denis. Very useful on two parts since I didn't really know anything about the ROLLUP functionality to begin with. Now I have a basic understanding of it and the Grouping functionality in conjunction. Thanks!
item.content:encoded: Thanks, Denis. Very useful on two parts since I didn’t really know anything about the ROLLUP functionality to begin with. Now I have a basic understanding of it and the Grouping functionality in conjunction. Thanks!
